name: Hellbreaker
description: Fast-paced first person shooter that will pit you against hordes of monsters.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista Processor: 2.4GHz dual core processor Memory: 600 MB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 3.2, Memory: 200 MB Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Processor: 3.1 GHz quad core processor Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Memory: 1.5 GB
